name: Shopee Cookies File
summary: Learn about .TDCK files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Shopee is an online shopping platform popular in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. Android users can install the Shopee app, which allows them to browse and purchase items in-app on their smartphone, tablet, or other Android device.

If you have granted the Shopee app storage permissions, it will create a number of cookie files used to share your Shopee data with other apps that show ads. These files use the .tdck, .td-3, and .tcookieid extensions.

instructions: TDCK files are not meant to be opened. To permanently delete TDCK files from your device, you must:
Disable Shopee's storage permissions or uninstall it.
If you do not disable Shopee's storage permissions or uninstall it, it will continually recreate TDCK files.
